title: mAyan kuzhalisaiyil
sahitya:
mAyan kuzhalisaiyil mayangi viTTEnaDipOi avaraik-kUTTi vADI puNNiyam uNDaDi


anupallavi

  tAi pirinda kanru pOl tavikkudaDi nenjam Ayar kula siruvan Avirkkiniya anban


caraNam    kATril midandu varum kAnam mOha kanavil Utru nei pOlavE uLLam urukkudaDi
mATru marundariyEnmeyyil umai pirindAl tUTrum ulagam enru durai vara sholludaDi
